title: WN TBD: Did Money Corrupt an A.I. Utopia?
description:
OpenAI was founded in 2015 with a billion dollars and an idealistic mission: Create artificial intelligence that could address humanity’s biggest problems, and do it out in the open. Then came the money problems.

Guest: Karen Hao, senior A.I. reporter at MIT Tech Review
 
Host
Lizzie O’Leary
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: WN TBD: Did Money Corrupt an A.I. Utopia?
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: OpenAI was supposed to democratize the race to build artificial intelligence. Then profits got in the way.
